AUTHOR: PookaMustard
INSTALL_MSG: GOG cog installed. To start usage, type `[p]gog <game you want to search here>`. You can also use `[p]gog gamecount` to retrieve the amount of games on GOG and `[p]gog random` to find a random game.
NAME: GOG
DESCRIPTION: Cog for searching games and movies on GOG.com, with visual in-chat information about the game such as its price and platforms supported. Requests and BeautifulSoup4 required to operate.
